name: Apocalypse Later
description:
In Apocalypse Later, you play as an explorer. Search the sewers of a post-apocalyptic city and explore the town itself, as you fight the deadly hoards of the infected.

Talk to fellow survivors, fight deadly enemies, and try your best to survive whatever the post-apocalypse throws at you.

Controls:
Use WASD to move around.

J - Sword Attack
K - Dodge Roll
L-Run

Font: m5x7 by Daniel Linssen
